name: Gold Forge
pages: The Gold forge is 2x more faster than the vanilla furnace, with 2 additional smelting slots, below is the recipe for it. This forge can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/gold_furnace)gold furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires 3 $(l:patchouli:items/gold_conductor_block)gold conductor blocks/$ in its recipe.
